attributes.action: Reinstate the death penalty for murderers, rapists, paedophiles, terrorists, major drug dealers, and people traffickers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A death penalty will be allowed to be given for certain cases involving murderers, rapists, paedophiles, terrorists, major drug dealers, and people traffickers. Whether the death penalty would be given would be decided on by three high court judges.

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=death+penalty
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
